2642.TW.summary: Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. provides trucking and door-to-door home delivery services in Taiwan. It offers C2C, B2C, and C2B home-delivery services. The company also provides warehousing and logistics services, as well as merchandise services and other services. Its fleet consist of 1,100 home delivery vehicles. Taiwan Pelican Express Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
